problem_names:
lemma next_plane_subset:
  "\<forall>f \<in> \<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [] \<Longrightarrow>
   set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g) \<subseteq> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)"

lemma mgp_next_plane0_if_next_plane:
  "minGraphProps g \<Longrightarrow> g [next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub>]\<rightarrow> g' \<Longrightarrow> g [next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub>]\<rightarrow> g'"
translations:
lemma next_plane_subset:
  "\<forall>f \<in> \<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [] \<Longrightarrow>
   set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g) \<subseteq> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [] \<Longrightarrow>
    set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)
    \<subseteq> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)
apply(clarsimp simp:next_plane0_def next_plane_def minimalFace_def finalGraph_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>xa\<in>set (nonFinals g).
                            \<exists>xb\<in>\<V> xa.
                               \<exists>xc\<in>{3..<4 + p}.
                                  x \<in> set (generatePolygon xc xb xa g)
apply(rule_tac x = "minimal (size \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)" in bexI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>xa\<in>\<V>
    (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)).
                            \<exists>xb\<in>{3..<4 + p}.
                               x \<in> set
  (generatePolygon xb xa (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g))
    g)
 2. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply(rule_tac x = "minimalVertex g (minimal (size \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g))" in bexI)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>xa\<in>{3..<4 + p}.
                            x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
    (minimalVertex g (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
    (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g)
 2. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimalVertex g
                          (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g))
                         \<in> \<V>
                                (minimal (length \<circ> vertices)
                                  (nonFinals g))
 3. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply blast

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimalVertex g
                          (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g))
                         \<in> \<V>
                                (minimal (length \<circ> vertices)
                                  (nonFinals g))
 2. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply(subgoal_tac "\<forall>f\<in>set (nonFinals g). vertices f \<noteq> []")

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p;
        \<forall>f\<in>set (nonFinals g). vertices f \<noteq> []\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimalVertex g
                          (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g))
                         \<in> \<V>
                                (minimal (length \<circ> vertices)
                                  (nonFinals g))
 2. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>f\<in>set (nonFinals g).
                            vertices f \<noteq> []
 3. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply(simp add:minimalVertex_def)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<forall>f\<in>set (nonFinals g).
                            vertices f \<noteq> []
 2. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply(simp add:nonFinals_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x xa.
       \<lbrakk>\<forall>f\<in>\<F> g. vertices f \<noteq> [];
        nonFinals g \<noteq> [];
        x \<in> set (generatePolygon xa
                      (minimalVertex g
                        (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)))
                      (minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)) g);
        3 \<le> xa; xa < 4 + p\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> minimal (length \<circ> vertices) (nonFinals g)
                         \<in> set (nonFinals g)
apply simp

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done

lemma mgp_next_plane0_if_next_plane:
  "minGraphProps g \<Longrightarrow> g [next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub>]\<rightarrow> g' \<Longrightarrow> g [next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub>]\<rightarrow> g'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>minGraphProps g;
     g' \<in> set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> g' \<in> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)
using next_plane_subset

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>f\<in>\<F> ?g. vertices f \<noteq> [] \<Longrightarrow>
  set (next_plane\<^bsub>?p\<^esub> ?g)
  \<subseteq> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>?p\<^esub> ?g)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>minGraphProps g;
     g' \<in> set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> g' \<in> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)
by(blast dest: mgp_vertices_nonempty)
lemma inv_inv_next_plane: "invariant inv next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. invariant Invariants.inv next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub>
apply(rule inv_subset[OF inv_inv_next_plane0])

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>g.
       Invariants.inv g \<Longrightarrow>
       set (next_plane\<^bsub>p\<^esub> g)
       \<subseteq> set (next_plane0\<^bsub>?p1\<^esub> g)
apply(blast dest: mgp_next_plane0_if_next_plane[OF inv_mgp])

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
end
